name: Embassy Suites Austin - Arboretum

reviews.text: Not the least expensive property in the Arboretum, however for what you get it is an incredible deal. The staff is excellent, amenities cannot be beat, and the location is great if you want to do any shopping at all (and I do often!). Unlike many hotels it is easy to get to from all directions and plenty of self parking (good if you're driving around town.) Best of all, the beds have great pillows on them. Only drawbacks are: you pay for wifi, the swans look a little cramped in their fountain, and the pool is a skinny box that is heavily chlorinated. Overall, my favorite place to stay in Austin.
reviews.title: You'll enjoy it more than the swans do...
Loved the Embassy
reviews.text: Great Stay, couldn't ask for much more from an Embassy Suites. Great shopping nearby, terrific complimentary happy hour and abundant breakfast.

reviews.title: Absolute best hotel in Austin!!!
reviews.text: Highly recommend this hotel located in the heart of the Arboretum area which is very scenic/upscale. This property offers all the usual Embassy Suites amenities (free made-to-order breakfast, free happy hour, etc.) and in addition the lobby area (complete with swans and reflecting pools!) is beautiful. A very relaxing stay and our room location (a suite) was perfect (very quiet). Would highly recommend the suites .... extra large room with a wet bar and living area included and the price was very affordable. Can book reservations on the internet and save even more $$$ too. I plan to stay here on any future trips to Austin .... most excellent!!!

reviews.title: Gorgeous Hotel!
reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel many times and I am never disappointed! The staff is friendly and professional, the swans are gorgeous. The food and happy hour are fantastic!! I recently treated my parents to a weekend at this hotel. The staff was super nice and treated them like VIPs! This hotel is one of the best values for the money. I fully recommend that if you stay in Austin, you should not want to stay anyplace else!! The staff always seems to know the right place to suggest for dinner. Also, kudos to the evening front desk manager (Josh H.) for being so super nice!!

description: Embassy Suites Austin – Arboretum, is only minutes away from downtown Austin and within walking distance of the Austin Arboretum’s shops and restaurants. Located 20 minutes from the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, our Austin Arboretum hotel is close to dining, the business district and the Austin technology hub near Charles Schwab, IBM and Microsoft.
